webpage_to_markdown.name: webpage_to_markdown
webpage_to_markdown.description: Converts web pages to markdown format, preserving structure and formatting

url.description: The URL of the webpage to convert

includeImages.description: Whether to include image links in the markdown (default: true)

includeLinks.description: Whether to preserve hyperlinks in the markdown (default: true)

maxLength.description: Maximum length of the markdown output in characters (default: 50000)

waitForSelector.description: Optional CSS selector to wait for before converting

length.description: Length of the markdown content in characters

truncated.description: Whether the content was truncated due to length limits

output.markdown:
# Example Domain

> Example description

> URL: https://example.com

---

This domain is for use in illustrative examples...
